home.sec-1-title: Hire a profesional photographer in Paris, and around the world.
home.sec-1-text1: Choose your destination and smile!, we are here to capture your moments by the hand of the best photographer in Paris, and around the world.
home.sec-2-title1: We are Fernanda & Pablo, your photographers in Paris.
home.sec-2-text1: Thanks to our network of photographer friends that we have carefully built around the world, we can help you live the experience not only in Paris but in any destination in the world, such as London, Rome, Venice, Madrid, Milan, etc. Taking a photo session and hire a profesional photographer is essential on your trip. We guarantee an unforgettable experience.
home.sec-3-title: Celebrate life through hiring a photographer in Paris and around the world
home.sec-3-subtitle: Get inspired to create your own beautiful moments!
home.sec-3-card3-text: Show the world who you are
home.sec-3-card4-text: Capture your proposal and pre-wedding moments..
home.sec-4-text1: High quality photographers, worry-free booking process, and exceptional photos every time
home.sec-5-text1: Make any occasion unforgettable in three simple steps.
home.sec-5-step1-text: Request your date and select your destination
home.sec-5-step2-text: Your photographer will arrive on time with their pro-gear to capture your moments and deliver a great time.
home.sec-5-step3-text: Your photos will be delivered within 5 days after the session,  to view, download and share them as you like.
home.sec-5-step4-text: Our editors will enhance your photos that will be delivered within 5 days after the session,  to view, download and share them as you like.
home.sec-6-subtitle: Get inspired by our clients' photo sessions and what they say about the experience.
home.sec-7-title: Ready to make your life memorable?
